greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of deficiencies of the proper divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
example: For n = 6, whose proper divisors are 1, 2, 3, their deficiencies are 1, 1, 2, thus a(6) = 1+1+2 = 4.
For n = 12, whose proper divisors are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, their deficiencies are 1, 1, 2, 1, 0, thus a(12) = 1+1+2+1+0 = 5.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 04 2017
